call_title: Dev Update Oct. 28th 2024 |  Cyberverse, Paideia, MewFinance, Sigs Mining, Sigmaspace and more!

decisions.decision: Paideia vote chose to distribute bonus payments evenly over everybody for a month
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Previously bonus payments were sent to random wallets, but a recent Paideia vote changed the distribution method
decisions.quote: I believe the Paideia vote that just happened chose to distribute them evenly over everybody for a month

commitments.commitment: Approved PR will be merged into 6.0 later today
commitments.quote: Approved and will be merged into 6.0 PR later today

commitments.commitment: Bootstrap Live Paideia with zero profit sharing and zero staking rewards once off-chain bug fix is live
commitments.quote: Once that fix is live, he will bootstrap Live Paideia with zero profit sharing and zero staking rewards so no one will miss out on anything

commitments.commitment: Sigmanauts DAO will be created to test DAO creation and give the Sigmanauts a free DAO
commitments.quote: Sigmanauts DAO, yay, will be created to test DAO creation and give the Sigmanauts a free DAO

commitments.commitment: It would be great if someone else can take a look at the Ledger PR before we merge it
commitments.quote: It would be great if someone else can take a look at the PR before we merge it

commitments.commitment: Instructions to run a Rosenet node will be provided later
commitments.quote: The instructions to run a node will be provided later

open_questions.question: What is the relevance of the 34 feet measurement in Rocket Rush scoring
open_questions.context: qx() noticed the specific number and wondered about its significance

open_questions.question: Whether cyber car minting event will be on Ergo blockchain
open_questions.context: qx() wondered if the Halloween cyber car minting would use ERG/CYPX instead of ADA

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts mining pool has about 76.39 gigahash
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sigmanauts mining pool has collected maybe 40 or so ERG from storage rent collection
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Javanese language has 95 million users worldwide and is the second language in Suriname
key_facts.speaker: Chris45

key_facts.fact: Mining pool found a block at 11:10 p.m. during the call
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Rosenet testing requires computers with at least 8GB RAM, 8 cores CPU, and will handle tens of gigabytes of data
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: Rosenet test will take around a day
key_facts.speaker: Armeanio

key_facts.fact: Paul's raffle raised $2,249 of $1,000 requested for Rosen-ETH ERG pair
key_facts.speaker: qx()
